title: Imagine Swings: reale Schaukel trifft auf virtuelle Realität // real swing meets virtual reality

speakers.name: Sinja Möller
speakers.bio: Sinja has a degree in design and, as the founder of Imagine Swings, develops products and experience concepts around swinging for adults. Since 2018, she has been working on the positive effect of swinging and how it can be used in living, working, event and health contexts.
